fields.name: registration_confirmation
fields.html_content:
Welcome {{name}}.

please click following link to activate your JobPlus account.

{{registration_link}}
fields.subject: Please confirm your JobPlus account

fields.name: reset_password
fields.html_content:
To reset password please click following link.

{{reset_password_link}}

Please ignore this email if this email is a mistake.
fields.description: this email will contain a link to reset password
fields.subject: JobPlus Reset Password
